data: A few days after the murder of Madame Séraphin, the death of the Chouette, and the arrest of the gang of desperadoes taken by surprise at Bras-Rouge’s house, Rodolph paid another visit to the house in the Rue du Temple.
The Mysteries of Paris, illustrated with etchings, Vol. 5
